casebody.data:
BLACK RIVER CRAWFISH FARMS, LLC
v.
Jack A KING Jr., et al. NO. 2018-C-1396 Supreme Court of Louisiana. January 8, 2019 ON WRIT OF CERTIORARI TO THE COURT OF APPEAL, THIRD CIRCUIT, PARISH OF CONCORDIA Writ denied. CLARK, J., would grant and docket. CRICHTON, J., would grant and docket and assigns reasons. GENOVESE, J., would grant and docket. Crichton, J., would grant and assigns reasons. I would grant and docket this application to examine the intersection of Civil Code articles related to real rights and prescription of nonuse, see C.C. arts. 481, 3448, and restoration claims asserted pursuant to La. R.S. 31:22. See also La. R.S. 31:27, 31:28, 31:29.
